title: Musk Calls for Judicial Impeachment Wave, Supports GOP Lawmakers
summary: Elon Musk publicly supports and financially backs GOP congressional efforts to impeach federal judges who block Trump administration policies
description: Amid tensions between the judicial branch and the Trump administration, Elon Musk publicly advocates for mass judicial impeachments and supports GOP lawmakers pursuing such resolutions

sources.title: Musk Calls for 'Wave' of Judicial Impeachments Amid DOGE Pushback
Hill Republicans aim to rein in judges but divided on strategy
Judges threatened with impeachment, bombs for ruling against Trump agenda

notes: Event highlights increasing political pressure on judicial independence in 2025.
